title: Mike Freeman on NFL's anthem policy, Russell Wilson's role, league's LeBron? (Football 06/01)
description:
Pete Prisco is joined by Bleacher Report columnist Mike Freeman to discuss the wide-ranging potential impact of the NFL's new national anthem policy and what gambling on football means moving forward. The guys then dive into Russell Wilson's role with the Seahawks before analyzing who is the league's version of LeBron James.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
